title: Pixel 2, Android 10, current as possible, Nearby Sharing nowhere to be found
content:
My Pixel 2 is current for system and apps. (Play Store? Who can tell?)

All the info I keep reading about Nearby Sharing suggests I should be able to find a way to enable it in Settings | Google (though there are several different variations on where it is in there, either at the top level or in Device Connections.)

It's not there. Nowhere.

Any ideas?
